question: Is a freight forwarder authorized to request issuance of the same number of bills of lading as the number of transport or cargo types involved?

answers.answer: Yes, if the cargo subject to carriage is distributed on several transports or if the cargo subject to carriage consist of goods of different kinds or are divided up into several batches
No, because only two copies of a bill of lading can be legally produced
Yes, if the contractual timeframe for transporting the cargo is more than 60 calendar days
